channel.title: Creating a lottery type command
channel.description:
Ok so I wan't to create my server a lottery. My ideas are that it will cost you 50m per ticket no matter what and if you win it gives you 1 bill. I wan't to make it so it is a 1 in 100 chance of winning. I don't want tickets just like a ::lottery and have it similar to something like that. If anyone can help get me started on where to start please post.
+ If you post here Mary|Jane I will simply just have your posts removed by a mod. Thx.

item.title: Creating a lottery type command
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“The Prodigyscape, post:5, topic:196856”]Where do I add the ints though?
Above or Below what?[/quote]
Add them above

public boolean process

That should make it easy for you

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a lottery type command
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

It’s a command…

Meaning you add it by all you’re other commands…

Such as ::home, or ::xrichie

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a lottery type command
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

You should probably change it to …

if(command.startsWith("lottery")) { String[] token = s.split(" "); int firstNum = Integer.parseInt(token[1]); int secondNum = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); int thirdNum = Integer.parseInt(token[3]); if(hasItemAmount(995, 50000000)) { if(firstNum == firstLot && secondNum == secondLot && thirdNum == thirdLot) addItem(995, 1000000000); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 50000000); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a lottery type command
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Ty testing right now.

Where would I declare those ints?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a lottery type command
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

declare -

int firstLot = misc.random(99);
int secondLot = misc.random(99);
int thirdLot = misc.random(99);

Add command -

[code]
if(command.startsWith(“lottery”)) {
String[] token = s.split(" ");
int firstNum = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int secondNum = Integer.parseInt(token[2]);
int thirdNum = Integer.parseInt(token[3]);

if(firstNum == firstLot && secondNum == secondLot && thirdNum == thirdLot) addItem(995, 1000000000);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 50000000);

}[/code]

Read full topic
